item.title: Project : Guinness World Record - Plaque and Announcement
item.description:
ESDS Software Solutions Ltd. (where I work currently) was lately the technical facilitator for the School Education Department of the Government of Maharashtra, towards conducting a state level slogan competition, the winner of which was rewarded by a lunch with the chief minister of Maharashtra.

Brief Context

One of the records (total of 3) they were going for was the most number of handwritten notes uploaded to a bespoke platform in 24 hours.
